docs.title: Magento × Mollie — Checkout Flow (Deep Analysis)
docs.text: Generated automatically from the Mollie Magento 2 module source.

docs.title: Coverage Summary
docs.text:
✓ 24 Magento events ✓ 25 observers documented ✓ 12 classes using Mollie API ✓ 3 unique API endpoints detected

It maps Magento events → Observers → Services → Mollie API calls.
